Incoming Push Video SDK API 0.1.26

The Incoming SDK client API provides the ability to record events and access information managed by the Incoming SDK.

See: Description

Packages 
Package Description
com.incoming.pvnsdk
Implementations of the API interfaces described in com.incoming.pvnsdk.
The Incoming SDK client API provides the ability to record events and access information managed by the Incoming SDK. Different aspects of the API are accessed using IncomingApiServiceLocator. This includes:
  • VideoPlaybackEventService
  • DataAccessService

IncomingApiServiceLocator also provides the ability for an application to easily replace the SDK API implementations with test stubs or mocks.
